page.title: 02Living in Woodhalls
page.content: The one thing that cements together residents of the area is a liking for their environment, whether they have always lived here or whether they have come to live here upon marriage or retirement. There is no village, and most people are farmers, earning their living from the land. Apart from two B class roads the area is divided only by a few minor roads and tracks, which gives a feeling of peace and quietness. Despite the lack of facilities and amenities there is a feeling that the area is a good place to live, where one is not always "running for time".Other reasons mentioned for enjoying living here were the friendliness of the people, and a feeling of safety and security. Residents appreciate their good fortune in living here.
